DOC.detailed_description: This double-blind , placebo-controlled , randomise , parallel group trial healthy male fem ale subject regular employment . The duration dose 28 ' ( +/- 1 ) ' day assessment w ill make two visit ( visit 2 3 ) training CDR system screen visit . The subject receive one bottle 35 tablet [ either Ginseng G115 40 mg , multivitamin , mu ltimineral '+ ' Paullinia cupana extract PC102 75 mg ( Guarana ) placebo ] pharmacy vestigational site . The subject take study drug day 0 day 28 ' ( +/- 1 ) ' Subjects assign one two treatment group randomly . The allocation ratio 2:1.. Study Hypothesis : H0 : No difference exist treatment placebo group term f baseline-adjusted change Power Attention 28 day average 4 6 hour time point . H1 : A difference exist treatment placebo group term baseline-adjusted change Power Attention 28 day average 4 6 hour time point . The null alternative hypothesis secondary endpoint set accor dingly . The statistical testing carry 0.05 level signifi cance . The test perform two-tailed . Comparison ( ) : The comparator match placebo film-coated tablet without active ingredien t .
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA Healthy male female subject regular employment , age 20 50 ear . Subjects give write informed consent accordance GCP local legi slation . EXCLUSION CRITERIA Subjects present clinical depression . Subjects show evidence dementia . Clinically relevant abnormality medical history examination . Subjects participate clinical study within 3 month prior start study . History drug and/or alcohol abuse . Subjects smoke 10 cigarette per day . Subjects opinion Investigator heavy user tobacco nicotine product ( e.g . snuff , chew tobacco , nicotine patch , nicotine g um , etc. ) . Subjects history food and/or drug allergy relevant study compound . Clinically relevant deviation normal find prestudy medica l screen . Subjects unable perform cognitive test . Subjects currently take cognition enhance substance , include Ginkgo , ginseng guarana product . Any subject regularly take medication might stop time uring active dosing phase . Pregnant lactate woman female subject childbearing potential u ing adequate mean birth control ( condom , contraceptive pill , IUDs , sterili sation ) . Subjects already take multivitamin product last 2 week . Healthy subject regularly take drug act Central Nervous System ( CNS ) .
